plot: A number of food trucks in a competition to see who earns the most money, with the lowest earning truck kicked off at the end of each episode.
plot_en: A number of food trucks in a competition to see who earns the most money, with the lowest earning truck kicked off at the end of each episode.
plot_es: A number of food trucks in a competition to see who earns the most money, with the lowest earning truck kicked off at the end of each episode.
title: The Great Food Truck Race
